TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ConditionalAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ConditionalAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ConditionalAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示編譯器應該忽略方法呼叫或屬性，除非已定義指定的條件式編譯符號。

span.span: Indicates to compilers that a method call or attribute should be ignored unless a specified conditional compilation symbol is defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以套用方法和類別屬性。You can apply the attribute to methods and classes. 不過，在類別上的使用僅適用於衍生的類型是。However, its use on classes is valid only for types that are derived from . 請將忽略或將會產生編譯器警告或錯誤訊息如果將它套用到任何其他型別。 either will be ignored or will produce a compiler warning or error message if you apply it to any other type. 套用方法表示編譯器方法的呼叫不應該編譯成 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 的條件式編譯符號，除非聯定義。Applying to a method indicates to compilers that a call to the method should not be compiled into Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) unless the conditional compilation symbol that is associated with is defined. 如果您將此屬性套用至不會傳回 void 的方法，您會收到編譯錯誤，Visual Studio 中。You will get a compilation error in Visual Studio if you apply this attribute to a method that does not return void. 套用屬性表示的屬性不應該發出至中繼資料除非已定義的條件式編譯符號。Applying to an attribute indicates that the attribute should not be emitted to metadata unless the conditional compilation symbol is defined. 任何引數傳遞給方法或屬性仍然型別檢查編譯器。Any arguments passed to the method or attribute are still type-checked by the compiler. 您可以使用下列技巧來定義條件式編譯符號：You can use the following techniques to define conditional compilation symbols: - 使用編譯器命令列選項。例如， **/ 定義： 偵錯**。Use compiler command-line options; for example, **/define:DEBUG**. - 使用作業系統 shell; 中的環境變數例如，**設定偵錯 = 1**。Use environment variables in the operating system shell; for example, **set DEBUG=1**. - 使用 pragma 在原始程式碼中。例如，定義編譯變數，如下所示：Use pragmas in the source code; for example, define the compilation variable as follows: ```csharp #define DEBUG ``` ```vb #Const DEBUG=True ``` 若要取消定義變數，使用下列方法：To undefine the variable, use the following: ```csharp #undef DEBUG ``` ```vb #Const DEBUG=False ``` 編譯器會遵循與 Common Language Specification (CLS) 允許忽略。Compilers that comply with the Common Language Specification (CLS) are permitted to ignore . C#、 Visual Basic 和 c + + 編譯器支援; JScript 編譯器不支援屬性。The C#, Visual Basic, and C++ compilers support ; the JScript compiler does not support the attribute. > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 中`AddressOf`運算子不會受到這個屬性。In Visual Basic, the `AddressOf` operator is not affected by this attribute. 例如，`Call CType(AddressOf delegate, Action)`一律會叫用`delegate`，不過`Call delegate()`不可能。For example, `Call CType(AddressOf delegate, Action)` always invokes `delegate`, although `Call delegate()` might not. 套用至方法中所定義的和類別。 is applied to the methods that are defined in the and classes. 如需如何使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about how to use attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範 的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of . 這個範例假設條件會定義與 **/ 定義**編譯器選項。The example assumes that the condition is defined with the **/define** compiler option. 您可以變更的編譯器選項，以取得不同的結果。You can obtain different results by changing the compiler option. 您可以選擇性地定義之條件的範例程式碼，而不是其識別為編譯器選項使用 pragma。You can optionally define the conditions by using pragmas in the sample code instead of identifying them as compiler options. [!code-csharp[ConditionalAttributeSample1#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ConditionalAttributeSample1/CS/cas.cs#7)] [!code-vb[ConditionalAttributeSample1#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ConditionalAttributeSample1/VB/cas.vb#7)]

summary.span: 取得與 屬性相關聯的條件式編譯符號。

span.span: Gets the conditional compilation symbol that is associated with the attribute.

value.span: 字串，指定與 屬性相關聯之區分大小寫的條件式編譯符號。

span.span: A string that specifies the case-sensitive conditional compilation symbol that is associated with the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是唯讀的。This property is read-only.
